ios.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/PagerViewExample.xcworkspace -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 11' -scheme PagerViewExample -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES

ios.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/PagerViewExample.xcworkspace -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 11' -scheme PagerViewExample -configuration Release -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES
